stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: Skill Registry
    [Infra_RedisCache] --> idle
    idle --> scanned : SCAN
    scanned --> scanned : SCAN
    scanned --> viewing : SELECT
    viewing --> scanned : BACK
    viewing --> viewing : SELECT
    scanned --> scanned : EXPORT
    viewing --> viewing : EXPORT
    scanned --> idle : RESET
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
